message: I'm feeling generous, but time is money Alice! Let's close this deal.
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair deal, take it or leave it.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  Don't let greed get in the way of a good deal.
Your 50/50 was close, but I still deserve a bit more
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a reasonable compromise -  take it before inflation eats away at my share even further and you're left with an even worse deal!
You're running out of time, take this deal
